about_the_game:
50 Stars: The Turn-Based Political Adventure


Do you have what it takes to become the leader of the free world? In 50 Stars, you can create your own political persona and campaign for the presidency of the United States. Choose your party, platform, and strategy as you face off against real-life opponents in debates, polls, and media appearances. But be careful: your actions and words will have consequences, and you’ll have to deal with rivals along the way.

50 Stars is a turn-based political adventure game that lets you make your own decisions and shape your own destiny. You can start from the bottom and work your way up, or jump straight into the presidential race. You can run for office in any of the 50 states, each with its own challenges and opportunities. You can pass and sign legislation, create budgets, make appointments, and deal with crises that affect your nation and the world. You can also interact with other characters and form friends or your foes.

Will you be a visionary leader or a ruthless dictator? A charismatic populist or a pragmatic moderate? A loyal patriot or a cunning opportunist? The choice is yours in 50 Stars: The Turn-Based Political Adventure.
